p: Gallic acid displays tyrosinase inhibitory activity and reduces dopaquinone back to L-DOPA through a redox cycling, similar to ascorbic acid( 33). Similarly, in the present study P. atlantica subsp. mutica decreased the level of tyrosinase protein in cells which is strongly correlated with the presence of quercetin, luteolin, isoquercetin, rutin, and other polyphenols in the plant.
